page.title: 14Traffic Survey
page.content: On{Friday July 5th 1985}we did a {traffic survey}at the{London Colney {roundabout.}The{roads}leading off it are the{A6 to London,}the{A405 from {Watford,}the{A405 to Hatfield}and the{North}via the{A1, London Road (A6) from{St. Albans,}and{London Colney {High Street.}We only counted vehicles coming off the A405 from the direction of Watford because it would be too difficult to count all the traffic on the roundabout. We chose this direction because the{A405}comes from the{Park Street roundabout}that connects the{M10/M1}to St. Albans. We went there at 1.30 pm and started timing our survey at 1.50 pm. We finished at 2.20 pm. We chose this time because it is always busy at lunch time and during the early afternoon, particularly on Fridays.
